films.title: Monster (2023)
films.description: A mother demands answers from her son's teacher when her son begins acting strangely.

films.title: Sky Fall (2012)
films.description: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

films.title: Mad Max: Fury Road (2015)
films.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper and a drifter named Max.

films.title: Your Name (2016)
films.description: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.
